Misc. Classes¶

CustomTestCase¶

class CustomTestCase.CustomTestCase(methodName='runTest')¶

Parent class of all script classes used for custom asserts (usually ‘soft’ asserts) and shared fixture setup and teardown

setUp()¶

Default setup method for all scripts. Connects either to the RC server configured in conf/selenium.ini or to Sauce Labs OnDemand

tearDown()¶

Default teardown method for all scripts. If run through Sauce Labs OnDemand, the job name, status and tags are updated. Also the video and server log are downloaded if so configured.

verifyEqual(want, got)¶

‘Soft’ assert for checking whether two things are equal

ConfigWrapper¶

class ConfigWrapper.ConfigWrapper¶

Singleton reference to the config information

SeleniumWrapper¶

class SeleniumWrapper.SeleniumWrapper¶

Singleton reference to the config information

SeleniumServer¶

Script for controlling the Selenium Server. Can be used from in a script or standalone. If used standalone, it can be called with either
  • check
  • start
  • stop
SeleniumServer.have_server()¶

Checks whether the server is running on localhost:4444 (the defaults)

Returns:Boolean
SeleniumServer.start_server()¶

Starts the included server and writes out the pid

SeleniumServer.stop_server()¶

Stops the process in the selenium server’s pid file.
